name: local-iso-logger
description: Simple logger with local timestamps in ISO8601 format, and clean stack traces on errors

scripts.prepublishOnly:esm: tsc index.ts -t ES2015 --types node --moduleResolution node && mv index.js index.mjs
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run prepublishOnly:esm; npm run prepublishOnly:cjs

scripts.prepublishOnly:esm: TypeScript can't generate .mjs output directly (https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/issues/18442) and --outFile doesn't work with ES Modules

comments.exports: [Conditional exports](https://nodejs.org/api/esm.html#esm_conditional_exports) enable TypeScript code transpiled with ES Modules, to use named imports. TypeScript doesn't directly support .mjs input files - https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/issues/27957
